text:
John Patrick Daly (born April 28, 1966) is an American professional golfer on the PGA Tour. He was born in Carmichael, California.
His two greatest moments of his career are his "zero to hero" victory in the 1991 PGA Championship, and his playoff victory over Costantino Rocca in the 1995 Open Championship.
In September 2020, Daly was diagnosed with bladder cancer.
